departureFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

returnFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

localTransport.details: Pre-booked airport transfer; scooter rental recommended for local travel. Ensure valid license and helmet use.

activities.title: Arrival & Transfer to Arpora
activities.description: Arrive at Dabolim Airport (GOI). Take pre-booked taxi to Resort Rio in Arpora.

activities.title: Relax at the Pool
activities.description: Enjoy the resort's swimming pool and unwind after your journey.

activities.title: Dinner at the Resort
activities.description: Dine at one of the resort's restaurants. Try a Goan fish thali.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at a Local Goan Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Enjoy dinner at a local Goan restaurant. This can support local businesses and may use locally sourced ingredients.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local economy, reduces food miles if ingredients are local.

activities.title: Visit Anjuna Flea Market
activities.description: Explore the famous Anjuna Flea Market (Wednesday Market) for souvenirs and local handicrafts.

activities.title: Lunch at Curlies Beach Shack
activities.description: Have lunch at Curlies Beach Shack on Anjuna Beach known for its seafood and views.

sustainableAlternative.title: Pack Your Own Picnic Lunch
sustainableAlternative.description: Prepare your own picnic lunch with locally sourced ingredients from a nearby market. Reduces waste from packaging.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces single-use plastic waste, promotes healthy eating.

activities.title: Visit Chapora Fort
activities.description: Visit Chapora Fort for panoramic views of Vagator Beach and the surrounding area.

activities.title: Explore Panjim
activities.description: Visit Panjim (Panaji), the capital city of Goa. Explore Fontainhas, the Latin Quarter.

sustainableAlternative.title: Walking Tour of Panjim
sustainableAlternative.description: Opt for a walking tour instead of a car or scooter. This reduces emissions and allows you to experience the city more intimately.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces carbon emissions and promotes physical activity.

activities.title: Lunch at a Restaurant in Panjim
activities.description: Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant in Panjim. Try Goan prawn curry.

activities.title: Visit the Basilica of Bom Jesus
activities.description: Visit the Basilica of Bom Jesus, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in Old Goa.
activities.location: Basilica of Bom Jesus, Old Goa

activities.title: Visit Dudhsagar Falls
activities.description: Take a day trip to Dudhsagar Falls, one of India's tallest waterfalls. Jeep safari included.

sustainableAlternative.title: Skip Dudhsagar, Visit Spice Plantation
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit a local spice plantation, learn about organic farming methods, and enjoy a traditional Goan lunch.  The Dudhsagar trip is environmentally impactful.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Promotes sustainable agriculture, reduces carbon footprint.

activities.title: Farewell Dinner
activities.description: Enjoy a farewell dinner at a restaurant near your hotel.
